mapper.insert: insert into user(user_email, user_password, user_nickname, user_intro, user_thumbnail) values("${userEmail}" ,"${userPassword}" , "${userNickname}", "${userIntro}", "${userThumbnail}");
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_nickname="${nickname}";
select count(*) from user where user_email="${email}";
mapper.update: update user set user_password="${tempPassword}" where user_email="${userEmail}";
mapper.delete: delete from follow where from_id=#{fromId} and to_id=#{toId};
